Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientHandlerRMI, ClientHandlerStub, ClientHandlerTCP
public abstract class ClientHandler extends Object implements Listener
Server-side handler for a generic client
